column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////In the client meal we ordered the Grande Tower
column3: crab and lobster.  This was awesome and worth the money.  We also had the broccoli and sweet potatos.  The sweet potatos were awesome... almost dessert like.  The broccoli tasted a bit strange.  Having had a large lunch prior to this dinner
column4: I wanted to keep it light
column5: so I order the Salmon.  It was tasty and fresh
column6: but probably not the best thing on the menu.
